niagara.physical
Class PhysicalNest

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.colombia.Op
      niagara.optimizer.colombia.PhysicalOp
          niagara.physical.PhysicalOperator
              niagara.physical.PhysicalGroup
                  niagara.physical.PhysicalNest
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Initializable, Instrumentable, Schedulable, SchemaProducer, SerializableToXML
public class PhysicalNest
extends PhysicalGroup

This is the PhysicalNestOperator that extends the PhysicalGroupOperator with the implementation of nesting (a form of grouping)

Version:
1.0

PhysicalNest

public PhysicalNest()
This is the constructor for the PhysicalNestOperator class that initializes it with the appropriate logical operator, source streams, sink streams, and the responsiveness to control information.

Parameters:
logicalOperator - The logical operator that this operator implements
sourceStreams - The Source Streams associated with the operator
sinkStreams - The Sink Streams associated with the operator
responsiveness - The responsiveness to control messages, in milli seconds

findLocalCost

public final Cost findLocalCost(ICatalog catalog,
                                LogicalProperty[] inputLogProp)
Description copied from class: PhysicalOp
Local cost of the operator, including output but not input costs. Thus we compute output costs only once, and get input costs from (as part of) the input operators' cost

Overrides:
findLocalCost in class PhysicalGroup
See Also:
